Darkfate:

"That's other point that we have to speak about" said Darkfate"A=
bout Alliance, taking in count that we have time, I suggest speak about it"=

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yah=
oogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, March 26, 2001 10:08 PM
  Subject: Re: All My=
 Chars/KitKat3


  ::Killfest::

  Killfest looks over at DrillBit, frownin=
g.

  "Hmm. I wouldn't say that's wise. Last time Hell Beast's group made a=
n
  offensive, they attacked the Maximals. Both us and the Alliance
  'aide=
d' the Maximals against Hell Beast. The Maximals are probably mad
  at him,=
 and letting them be mad at him could give us a big advantage,
  keeping th=
em off our backs and on Hell Beast's. Plus, if the Alliance
  is aiding the=
 Maximals, and we're supposedly on good terms with them,
  we might as well=
 keep low in case they aid the Maximals again."



  --- In nbwrpg@y..., Ro=
boRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
  > ::DrillBit::
  > 
  > "Ok. I'll ask Dark=
Fate and Kill about the attack now."
  > He walks back into the room.
  > "=
Dark, Kill, you guys want to attack the CF?"
  > 
  > ::Hot Rod::
  > 
  > =
He sent the location.(I dont really care where) 
  > "I'll meet you there a=
sap."
  > He ran out of the CF, transformed, and drove towards the location=
.
